description: Looking for an easy wintry midweek meal? Go for our cosy chicken and corn soup recipe to master a warming Asian classic.
name: Chicken & Corn Soup Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add creamed corn, soy and stock, then bring to the boil. Add chicken. Reduce heat to low, simmer, uncovered, for 8 minutes or until hot. Gradually stir in egg white. Remove pan from heat. Divide soup among bowls and serve sprinkled with remaining onion.
